caption.center: Oscar MUSE, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Appellee.

opinion.posture: Motion for appeal from a Judgment from Pulaski Circuit Court, $50 fine and thirty days imprisonment.
opinion.attorneys:
W.N. Flippin for appellant.
Eldon S. Dummit, Attorney General, and H.K. Spear, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.
